General.Name: Ganges Securities Limited
General.Description: Ganges Securities Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the tea and investment business primarily in India. The company is involved in tea manufacturing and processing activities; and invests and deals in securities and immovable properties. It also engages in rental and leasing activities, as well as property and professional services. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
